info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 9 at 10:38PM EDT until July 10 at 1:45AM EDT by NWS Raleigh NC
info.description:
FFWRAH
The National Weather Service in Raleigh has extended the
* Flash Flood Warning for... Durham County in central North Carolina... Southern Granville County in central North Carolina... Southeastern Orange County in central North Carolina...
* Until 145 AM EDT.
* At 1038 PM EDT, Multiple reports from local media and local law enforcement of several vehicles stranded in flood waters and water rescues around the Durham area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Law enforcement and media reported.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Durham, Chapel Hill, Oxford, Hillsborough, Creedmoor, Carrboro, Butner, Stem, Gorman, Lake Michie, Bahama, Lake Butner, Falls Lake, Bethesda, Eno River State Park, Parkwood and Jordan Lake.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 1:45 AM EDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 1:45 AM EDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

area.areaDesc: Durham, NC; Granville, NC; Orange, NC

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 1:45 AM EDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 1:45 AM EDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.

area.areaDesc: Durham, NC; Granville, NC; Orange, NC
